Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to the mandatory age of the chief of the town of Southampton police department
Summary: Exempts the chief of police of the town of Southampton, county of Suffolk, from mandatory age requirements; authorizes such chief of police to remain in service until such member has attained the age of 65.
LawCode: Amd ยง384-d, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the mandatory age of the members of the town of Southampton police department
